decks.notes: The main focus of this deck is to play aggressively using cheap, efficient spells and creature like Delver of Secrets and Cryptic Serpent to quickly deal damage to the opponent. The deck includes a lot of card draw and counterspells to control the board and make sure the opponent can't stop the aggressive plays. The goal is to overwhelm the opponent with early threats and protect them with counterspells, while generating card advantage through card draw and graveyard interactions.

The main focus of this deck is to utilize the Balustrade Spy card to mill cards from your own deck, particularly focusing on getting Lotleth Giant into the graveyard. This combo allows for powerful plays involving Dread Return and other key cards like Axebane Guardian and Overgrown Battlement to generate massive amounts of mana and summon a large number of creatures onto the battlefield. The deck also includes support cards like Lead the Stampede and Winding Way to ensure a consistent flow of creatures to keep the combo going.

This deck focuses on quickly casting spells to fill the graveyard, enabling the use of cheap, powerful creatures and disruptive spells. The goal is to maintain control of the game while pressuring the opponent with evasive threats. Through a combination of card draw, countermagic, and efficient creatures, the deck aims to overwhelm the opponent and secure a quick victory through aggressive plays.

The main focus of this deck is to control the game through counterspells and cards that disrupt the opponent's strategy. It includes a mix of draw spells and cheap counterspells to maintain card advantage and control the pace of the game. Additionally, it aims to generate creatures through spells like Murmuring Mystic and Tolarian Terror, which can provide a win condition if needed. The deck is efficient and streamlined, utilizing the power of blue to dominate the battlefield and outmaneuver the opponent.

The deck focuses on utilizing artifacts to generate value and aggressive threats quickly. It aims to overwhelm the opponent with an early board presence and finish them off with burn spells like Galvanic Blast. The key strategy is to use cards like Myr Enforcer and Refurbished Familiar to put pressure on the opponent while also drawing cards with Thoughtcast and Ichor Wellspring. Additionally, cards like Krark-Clan Shaman and Nihil Spellbomb provide disruption and removal to help the deck maintain control of the battlefield.

The main focus of this deck is to generate large amounts of mana using the High Tide mechanic, allowing the player to cast multiple spells in a single turn to achieve a powerful combo win condition. This deck includes various cards that enable efficient card draw and mana manipulation, such as Hidden Strings, Ideas Unbound, and Merchant Scroll. By carefully sequencing spells and utilizing the High Tide effect, the player can quickly build up their resources and overwhelm their opponent with a burst of powerful spellcasting.

The main concept of this deck is to utilize sacrifice effects and recursion to maintain board control and pressure the opponent with constant threats. Through a mix of removal spells, discard effects, and creature recursion, the deck aims to disrupt the opponent's game plan while steadily building up its own board presence. The inclusion of artifacts like Ichor Wellspring and Nihil Spellbomb also provide card advantage and utility to ensure the deck's consistency and resilience in longer games. The deck aims to overwhelm the opponent with a combination of aggression and resource management.

The main focus of this Mono Blue Aggro deck is to quickly play low-cost creatures like Delver of Secrets and Tolarian Terror, supported by spells like Brainstorm and LÃ³rien Revealed to control the board and disrupt the opponent's strategy. Cryptic Serpent acts as a strong finisher, while counterspells like Dispel and Counterspell help protect your creatures and prevent your opponent from gaining an advantage. The deck aims to win by consistently applying pressure and maintaining tempo advantage through card draw and disruption.

The main idea of this deck is to quickly deal damage to the opponent using aggressive creatures like Guttersnipe and Kessig Flamebreather, while also utilizing burn spells such as Lightning Bolt and Fiery Temper. This deck aims to overwhelm the opponent with a combination of direct damage and creatures that can deal damage without attacking. The key strategy is to efficiently use burn spells and creature abilities to chip away at the opponent's life total while keeping up pressure on the board.

The deck focuses on using sacrifice effects and artifact synergy to maintain a relentless aggressive playstyle. By sacrificing artifacts and creatures, the player can trigger various abilities that can disrupt the opponent's strategy and generate value. The deck also includes removal spells and card draw to provide versatility and consistency. Overall, the goal is to overwhelm the opponent with a combination of aggressive creatures and disruptive spells, while utilizing sacrifice effects to gain advantage and maintain pressure on the opponent.

The main idea of this deck is to quickly deal damage to the opponent using aggressive red creatures and burn spells. The deck focuses on playing low-cost creatures like Goblin Bushwhacker and Burning-Tree Emissary, while also using burn spells like Lightning Bolt and Galvanic Blast to finish off the opponent. The deck also includes cards like Manamorphose and Reckless Impulse to help with card draw and mana efficiency. Overall, the goal is to overwhelm the opponent with a fast and aggressive playstyle.

This deck focuses on aggressive play with low-cost creatures and burn spells to quickly deal damage to the opponent. The key strategy is to maintain board presence with cheap threats like Sneaky Snacker and Voldaren Epicure while using cards like Lightning Bolt and Fiery Temper to clear the way and finish off the opponent. Alms of the Vein and Vampire's Kiss provide additional reach for closing out games, while cards like Faithless Looting help filter through the deck for more threats. Overall, the deck aims to be fast and aggressive, overwhelming the opponent before they can stabilize.

The main focus of this Pauper aggro-burn deck is to quickly deal damage to the opponent using cheap and efficient burn spells like Lightning Bolt and Lava Dart, while also utilizing creatures like Voldaren Epicure and Kessig Flamebreather to pressure the opponent. The deck also includes card draw and loot effects like Faithless Looting to maintain hand advantage, as well as Guttersnipe to provide additional damage whenever instants and sorceries are cast. Ultimately, the goal is to overwhelm and finish off the opponent with a combination of direct damage and creature attacks.

This deck focuses on quickly dealing damage to the opponent using aggressive creatures and burn spells. By efficiently using cards like Lava Dart, Lightning Bolt, and Fireblast, along with creatures like Kessig Flamebreather and Voldaren Epicure, the goal is to deplete the opponent's life total as fast as possible. Faithless Looting helps to dig for more burn spells and creatures, while Grab the Prize and Highway Robbery provide additional ways to maintain pressure on the opponent. Guttersnipe and Sneaky Snacker offer additional damage potential to close out games swiftly.

The main concept of this Dimir Control deck is to establish control over the game through card advantage and disruption. By using efficient removal spells, counterspells, and card draw effects, the deck aims to outvalue the opponent and protect its own key threats. The inclusion of evasive creatures like Ninja of the Deep Hours and Spellstutter Sprite allows the deck to pressure the opponent while maintaining control of the board. The deck also utilizes card selection effects like Brainstorm and Preordain to find key cards and maintain consistency in its game plan.

The main concept of this deck is to overwhelm the opponent with a swarm of small, efficient creatures that are enhanced by enchantments and auras. By boosting them with cards like Ethereal Armor and Spirit Link, the weenie white creatures can quickly become powerful threats. The inclusion of protection and evasion spells like Emerge Unscathed and Skyward Spider help to protect and enable the aggressive game plan. Sandstone Bridge provides additional utility by granting the creatures vigilance and a power boost. The goal is to quickly build a strong board presence and outpace the opponent.
